greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of compositions of n into distinct parts such that the difference between any two parts is at least two.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=0} k! * x^(k^2) / Product_{j=1..k} (1 - x^j). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Dec 04 2020
maple: b:= proc(n, i, p) option remember; `if`(i*(i+1)/2<n, 0,
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Feb 24 2020
